prompt.content:
Using the Basic-Fit N.V. Annual Report for FY 2024, calculate the Price to Pre-IFRS 16 Free Cash Flow multiple (P / Pre-IFRS 16 FCF).
 Calculate the multiple using the share price at year-end 2024.

messages.content: [{"criteria":"Includes share price at year-end 2024 = €22.58 as an input","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Includes Free cash flow before new club capex per share = €2.36 as an input"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Calculates the multiple by dividing share price by FCF per share: €22.58 / €2.36 = 9.567…"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Shows final Price to Pre-IFRS 16 Free Cash Flow multiple = 9.57 exactly with 2 decimal points of rounding"}]
